amendment.description: To limit the funds available to the Department of Defense for expenses relating to conferences.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4787 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4787 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 223.
Motion to table amendment SA 4787 made in Senate.

Amendment SA 4787 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S8675-8676, S8681-8682; text: CR S8675) To limit the funds available to the Department of Defense for expenses relating to conferences.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4787 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4787 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 223.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4787 proposed by Senator Coburn.
